mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_prizes (user_id, prize_id, won_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{prizeId}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT u.id AS userId, p.id AS prizeId, p.name AS prizeName, u.username AS username, u.password AS password, up.won_time AS wonTime FROM user_prize up JOIN users u ON up.user_id = u.id JOIN prizes p ON up.prize_id = p.id WHERE u.id = #{userId}
